pullrequest.title: fix #2768
pullrequest.body: fix #2768 that the namespace length is mis-calculated for private namespaces and public namespaces which don't need to append prefix

pullrequest.title: fix the issue that a non-properties namespace could not be cleared
[APOLLO-2015]: fix bug that cannot resolve blank line in properties under Windows
add rate limter for no app id warning log
add servlet initializer for apollo-portal and apollo-adminservice
do not allow user to create private app namespace with the same name as some public app namespace
